name: Base Event
description: The base event is a generic concrete event and it also defines a set of attributes available in most event classes. As a generic event that does not belong to any event category, it could be used to log events that are not otherwise defined by the schema.

end_time.name: End Time
end_time.description: The time when the event ended or when the activity was last observed.

labels.description:
The list of labels attached to the event or specific attributes.

For example: ["network", "connection.ip:destination", "device.ip:source"]

user.description: The user that pertains to the event.

version.description: The version of the event class, using Semantic Versioning Specification (SemVer). For example: 1.0.0. Event consumers use the version to determine the available event attributes.
